sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { getCartTotal,removeItem, increaseItemQuantity,decreaseItemQuantity,addToWhishList } from '../features/cartSlice' const CartPage = () => { const {cart, totalQuantity,totalPrice,saved} =useSelector((state)=>state.allCart); const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getCartTotal()); },[cart]) return (
Cart-{cart.length} items
{ cart.map((data)=>(

{data.title}

{data.price}$

{data.rating}

{totalPrice}$

)) }
Summary
  • Total quantity {totalQuantity}
  • YOU SAVED
    {saved}$
  • Total amount
    {totalPrice}$
) } export default CartPage
